basics.name: Raj Sonawala
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with practical experience at Rexroth Bosch, specializing in PHP development and delivering clean, maintainable code. Skilled in both front-end and back-end technologies, with a strong commitment to clean code principles and regular debugging to ensure reliable, high-quality software. Experienced in Agile environments, collaborating effectively within cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and performant web applications. Currently seeking a Full Stack Developer role to utilize my comprehensive technical skills and disciplined approach to software craftsmanship in building innovative solutions.

work.name: Bosch Rexroth AG
work.summary: Designed and developed scalable backend systems using PHP 8 MVC and Laravel 11, integrated with MySQL databases managing over 7 million records. Built responsive, user-friendly interfaces with Angular and Angular Material, delivering seamless user experiences. Developed full-stack applications to streamline data workflows for the sales department.
highlights: Built backend systems with PHP 8 MVC and Laravel 11.
Managed large-scale data (7M+ records) in MySQL.
Created responsive interfaces with Angular and Angular Material.
Streamlined data workflows for the sales department.

work.name: Bosch Rexroth AG
work.summary: Created and documented REST APIs using Swagger UI. Resolved critical bugs and maintained legacy systems built with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and PHP. Developed an ETL process using KNIME to automate data extraction from SAP to MySQL.
highlights: Created/documented REST APIs with Swagger UI.
Automated ETL from SAP to MySQL using KNIME.

work.name: Uni-app.com
work.summary: Automated extraction of HTML data from thousands of partner websites using Python, BeautifulSoup, and Selenium. Structured data into CSVs and injected into OpenSearch for real-time analytics. Maintained OpenSearch operations ensuring 99% uptime.
highlights: Automated data extraction using Python, BeautifulSoup, Selenium.
Processed data into CSVs and OpenSearch.

work.name: Udrus (NEOM GmbH)
work.summary: Rebuilt a monolithic WordPress site into a scalable Angular 17 and Spring Boot 11 application. Implemented REST APIs and integrated Google/Facebook login. Designed search with pagination, reducing search time by 40%.
highlights: Migrated from WordPress to Angular 17 & Spring Boot 11.
Reduced search time by 40% with pagination.

education.institution: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: After Market Intelligence Tool (Full – Stack Dynamic Web Application)
projects.description: Developed a scalable and high-performance data management and search platform for managing millions of product-related records. The platform leveraged Angular 11 for the front-end and Laravel 11 for the back end, optimizing the search process for relational data using REST APIs.
key_contributions: Reduced search query processing time to milliseconds, improving the user experience and enabling real-time data access, even with large-scale data sets.

Built two powerful search features that allowed users to instantly search through millions of data records in milliseconds using highly optimized REST APIs, leveraging indexing and table joins on the backend.
Developed fast, secure, and well-documented REST APIs using Swagger UI, enabling real-time, scalable searching and data retrieval, reducing search times by 90% compared to previous systems.
Implemented Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to manage user permissions and access levels, ensuring users only see data relevant to their roles.
Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface using Angular 11, Bootstrap 5, and Angular Material UI for smooth navigation and interaction with millions of records.

certificates.name: APIs in PHP: from Basic to Advance
